bwwExcerpt: *CRITICS PICK* Rather it is a slender, swift and healthy exercise in hagiography, burnishing its saints and martyrs to a high sheen. Clooney’s glamour, abetted by David Cromer’s suave direction, does a lot of that work... Clooney performs them with wit, integrity and charming modesty.

keyPhrases.quote: Clooney performs them with wit, integrity and charming modesty.
